content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Not much of a fan of food that is pre heated on lamps.  The fried rice was basic, I would skip that. But the bulgogi was really savory.  The prime beef lemon pepper burrito was impressive and my favorite thing about Hanshik.  The tacos were pretty good as well.  The wings were really crispy and juicy on the inside.  I really enjoyed the wings. They do have a lot of flavor.
